item.title: Fragrance Du Bois opens a temporary store at Tangs in Singapore
item.description:
Source: Fragrance Du Bois. Fragrance Du Bois has opened a temporary boutique at TANGS, a major department store in Singapore’s Orchard Road shopping area, until September 4, 2015. This marks their second appearance at TANGS this year. The pop-up offers customers a direct encounter with niche perfumery and showcases Fragrance Du Bois’ fragrances, all made with 100% pure, natural oud. Nicola Parker, Brand Director of Fragrance Du Bois, noted a rising interest in niche perfumery...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fragrance-du-bois-opens-a-temporary-store-at-tangs-in-singapore/
